cssCode.#text: body, html { background-color:  #faf9f6; font-family: montserrat, sans-serif; margin: 0; max-width: 100%; padding: 0; overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.7) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); scrollbar-width: thin; } nav { align-items: center; background-color:  #ffff; display: flex; height: 60px; justify-content: space-between; max-width: 100%; padding: 1rem 0 1rem 1rem !important; z-index: 1; } ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; } .links { align-items: center; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-left: 1rem; margin-right: 25%; min-width: 700px; width: 50%; } .menu { background-color: initial; border: none; cursor: pointer; display: none; padding: 0; position: absolute; right: 1.5rem; width: 4rem; } .logo:hover { cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transform: scale(1.1); transition: all 0.25s ease-in-out; } .links-li a, .links-li a:visited { color: #000; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 400; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; position: relative; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out; } .links a:hover { color: grey; } .links a:hover::before, .links a::before { background-color: rgb(75, 75, 75); bottom: 0; content: ''; height: 2px; left: 50%; position: absolute; transform: translateX(-50%); transition: all 0.25s ease-in-out; width: 0; } .links a:hover::before { width: 100%; } .logo img { height: 68px; } #style-AM5Zm.style-AM5Zm { transition: top 0.3s ease; } @media (max-width: 950px) { .scroll-down-icon { animation: jump-phone 1.5s infinite !important; } .dashcard h3{ font-size: .8rem !important; } .dashcard, .action .dashcard{ width: 100% !important; margin: 0 0 1.5rem !important; min-width: 195px !important; } .piecard{ width: 100% !important; margin: 0 0 1.5rem !important; min-width: 195px !important; } .label{ width: 100% !important; justify-content: space-between !important; margin:  0 0 1rem !important; } .pickDate form{ width: 100% !important; justify-content: space-between !important; flex-wrap: wrap !important; margin: 0 0 1rem!important; } }

body { font-family: montserrat, sans-serif; background-color: #faf9f6; margin: 0; max-width: 100%; padding: 0; } * { font-family: montserrat, sans-serif; } html { background-color: #faf9f6; overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.7) rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); scrollbar-width: thin; } :root { --secondary-color: #2e3c40; --primary-color: #e2ba5a; --white-color: #faf9f6; } @media screen and (max-width: 1350px) { .page-contain { padding: 0 5% 4rem !important; } .data-card { height: 18% !important; padding: 1rem !important; width: 16% !important; } .data-card h4 { font-size: .8em !important; } .data-card h3 { font-size: 2em !important; padding: 0 0 .142857143em !important; } } .page-contain { align-items: center; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; justify-content: center; } .data-card { background: #fff; clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 92%, 0px 100%); display: block; flex-direction: column; margin: 1%; min-height: 300px; overflow: hidden; padding: 2.75em 1.5em; text-decoration: none; transition: transform 0.45s ease, background 0.45s ease; width: 20%; min-width: 200px; } .data-card:hover, .data-card:active { background: #e2ba5a; transform: scale(1.02); } .data-card:nth-child(3) { clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, 0px 93%); } .data-card:nth-child(4) { clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, 0px 87%); } .data-card:first-child { clip-path: polygon(0px 0px, 100% 0px, 100% 100%, 0px 90%); } .data-card h4 { color: rgb(98, 112, 132); font-size: 1em; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.1em; line-height: 1; margin: 0px 0px 1.77778em; text-transform: uppercase; transition: color 0.45s ease; } .data-card p { color: #faf9f6; font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.1; margin: 0px 0px 1.25em; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-1em); transition: opacity 0.45s ease, transform 0.5s ease; } .link-text { display: none; } .data-card .link-text { color: rgb(229, 178, 62); font-size: 1em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 0.9; margin: auto 0px 0px; transition: color 0.45s ease; } h3 { max-width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .data-card h3 { border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(229, 178, 62); color: #2e3c40; font-size: 3em; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1; margin: 0px 0px 0.142857em; padding-bottom: 0.5em; transition: color 0.45s ease, border 0.45s ease; } .data-card:hover h3, .data-card:hover h4, .data-card:hover p, .data-card:hover .link-text { color: #faf9f6; opacity: 1; } .data-card .link-text svg { margin-left: 0.5em; transition: transform 0.6s ease; } .data-card:hover .link-text svg { animation: 1.25s ease 0s infinite alternate none running point; } @keyframes point { 0% { transform: translateX(0px); } 100% { transform: translateX(0.1em); } } .page-contain .inner{ display: flex; width: 35%; min-width: 250px; justify-content: space-around; flex-wrap: wrap; flex-grow: 100; } .data-card { height: 18% !important; padding: 1rem !important; } .data-card h4 { font-size: .8em !important; } .data-card h3 { font-size: 2em !important; padding: 0 0 .142857143em !important; }

body { font-family:montserrat,sans-serif; } * { font-family: montserrat,sans-serif; } body { background-color: #faf9f6; background-color: #faf9f6; font-family: montserrat,sans-serif; margin: 0; max-width: 100vw; padding: 0; } html { background-color: #faf9f6; background-color: #faf9f6; overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: #9b9b9bb3 #0000; scrollbar-width: thin; } :root { --secondary-color: #2e3c40; --primary-color: #e2ba5a; --white-color: #faf9f6; } @media (max-width: 1500px){ .apartment { width: 80vw!important; } } .apartment { align-items: center; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center; max-width: 100vw; overflow: hidden; } .apartment { -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); background-color: #e2ba5a; background-color: #e2ba5a; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px 0 #63636333; -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 4%,100% 0,100% 100%,0 92%); clip-path: polygon(0 4%,100% 0,100% 100%,0 92%); color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; margin: 2rem; width: 65vw; } .apartment { transform: translateX(-100px); } .apartment,.apartment:nth-child(2n + 1) { opacity: 0; transition: opacity 1s,transform 1s; } .apartment:nth-child(2n + 1) { transform: translateX(100px); } .apartment.visible { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } *  { max-width: 100%; } .apartment span { flex-grow: 2; } .apartment-inner { display: flex; flex-direction: column; flex-grow: 1; justify-content: flex-start; padding: 2rem; } .apartment img { height: 110%; min-height: 350px; object-fit: cover; width: 350px; } h3 { max-width: 100vw; overflow: hidden; } .apartment-inner h3  { font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: 600; margin: 0 0 1rem; } .apartment h3 { color: #2e3c40; color: #2e3c40; font-size: 2rem; font-weight: 650; margin: 0 0 1rem; max-width: 100vw; overflow: hidden; } .apartment-info { color: #4b4b4b; display: inline; margin: 0 0 1rem; padding: .5rem 0; } .apartments p { font-size: 1.4rem; font-weight: 400; margin: 0 0 2rem 10%; max-width: 80vw; } .apartment-inner p  { font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 400; margin: 0 0 1rem .5rem; } .apartment-inner a  { align-items: center; background-color: #2e3c40; background-color: #2e3c40; border: none; color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 400; padding: .5rem 1rem; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; transition: .2s ease-in-out; width: calc(100% - 2rem); } .apartment-inner a:hover { background-color: #f9f9f98e; color: #2e3c40; color: #2e3c40; margin: 0 10%; width: calc(80% - 2rem); } .apartment-info span  { border-right: 1px solid #2e3c40; border-right: 1px solid #2e3c40; margin-left: .5rem; padding-right: .5rem; } .svg-inline--fa { display: var(--fa-display, inline-block); height: 1em; overflow: visible; vertical-align: -0.125em; } .fa-wifi { color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-right: .5rem; } svg:not(:root).svg-inline--fa,svg:not(:host).svg-inline--fa { overflow: visible; box-sizing: content-box; } .fa-bed { color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-right: .5rem; } .apartment-info img  { filter: invert(1); height: 1.1rem; min-height: 0; object-fit: fill; width: 1.1rem; } .fa-utensils { color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-right: .5rem; } .fa-wind { color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-right: .5rem; } .fa-shower { color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-right: .5rem; } .fa-tv { color: #faf9f6; color: #faf9f6; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-right: .5rem; } @media (max-width: 1100px) { .apartment, .apartment:nth-child(2), .apartment:nth-child(4), .apartment:nth-child(6) { flex-direction: column !important; } .apartment { min-width: 350px !important; padding-bottom: 3.5rem !important; width: 40vw !important; } .apartImg { width: 100%; } .apartImg img { object-fit: cover !important; width: 100% !important; } } .apartment { width: 90% !important; }

htmlCode.#text:
Usluge za podjetja

sestanki, apartmaji, poslovna kosila.

Ponujamo najboljše doživetje za vaše delavce na slovenski obali. Zagotavljamo vse za sejme, podjetniška srečanja in poslovna kosila.

cssCode.#text: body { font-family:montserrat,sans-serif; } * { font-family: montserrat,sans-serif; } body { background-color: #faf9f6; background-color: #faf9f6; font-family: montserrat,sans-serif; margin: 0; max-width: 100vw; padding: 0; } html { background-color: #faf9f6; background-color: #faf9f6; overflow-x: hidden; scroll-behavior: smooth; scrollbar-color: #9b9b9bb3 #0000; scrollbar-width: thin; } :root { --secondary-color: #2e3c40; --primary-color: #e2ba5a; --white-color: #faf9f6; } .blog-card { background: #faf9f6; border: none; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: 0 3px 7px -1px #0000001a; -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 5%,100% 94%,0 100%); clip-path: polygon(0 0,100% 5%,100% 94%,0 100%); display: flex; flex-direction: column; font-family: sans-serif; line-height: 1.4; margin: 2rem auto; overflow: hidden; width: clamp(300px,40%,600px); z-index: 0; } .meta  { height: 200px; position: relative; z-index: 0; } .description  { align-content: center; background-color: #ffff; display: flex; flex-direction: column; max-height: 100%; min-height: 220px; padding: 2rem 2rem 3rem; position: relative; transition: .25s ease-in-out; z-index: 1; } .blog-card:hover .description  { transform: translateY(-1rem); } h1 { max-width: 100vw; overflow: hidden; } .description h1  { color: #2e3c40; font-size: 2rem; line-height: 1.2; margin: 0; } h2 { max-width: 100vw; overflow: hidden; } .description h2  { color: #e2ba5a; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 350 italic; margin-top: 5px; text-transform: uppercase; } .blog-card p { color: #2e3c40; font-weight: 450; margin: 1rem 0 0; position: relative; } p:first-of-type  { margin-top: 1.25rem; } .photo img  { height: 300px; object-fit: cover; transition: .25s ease-in-out; width: 100%; } .blog-card:hover .photo img  { transform: scale(1.1) rotate(2deg); }

cssCode.#text: .airbnb-style-cards{ width: 100%; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin: 2rem 0; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; background-color: #fff; } .card-list{ width: 100%; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin: 2rem 40px; } .card{ width: clamp(250px, 20%, 300px); margin: 1rem .5rem; cursor: pointer; } .card-top{ position: relative; } .card-top img{ width: 100%; border-radius: 10px; } .like-btn{ position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; border: none; padding: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.1s ease-in-out; margin: .5rem; } .like-btn:hover{ opacity: 0.7; } .notification{ position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; background-color: #fff; color: #000; padding: 0.5rem; border-radius: 10px; margin: .5rem; } .img-pagination{ display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin: 1rem 0; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); } .img-pagination-item{ width: 6px; height: 6px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 50%; margin: 0 4px; cursor: pointer; opacity: .5; transition: 0.1s ease-in-out; } .arrow { /* display: none; */ position: absolute; transform: translateY(-50%); border: none; background-color: #fff; color: #000; padding: 0.5rem; border-radius: 50%; margin: 0.5rem; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.1s ease-in-out; opacity: 0; /* z-index: -1; */ } .card:hover .arrow{ opacity: 0.85; } .arrow:hover{ opacity: 1; scale: 1.05; } .left-a{ top: 50%; left: 0; } .right-a{ top: 50%; right: 0; } .active, .img-pagination-item:hover{ transform: scale(1.5); opacity: 1; } .card-bottom{ display: flex; justify-content: space-between; /* align-items: center; */ padding: 1rem 0; border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px; background-color: #fff; } .left h3{ margin: 0; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 600; } .left h4, .date{ margin: 0.5rem 0 0 0; font-size: 1rem; color: #777; font-weight: 400; } .date{ margin: 0; } .price{ margin: 0.5rem 0; } .price-value{ font-weight: bold; } .rating{ display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .star{ display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; margin: 0 3px; width: 16px; height: 16px; }

cssCode.#text: .minimalistic-product-card{ background-color: white; padding 1rem; width: 100%; font-family: 'Rubik', sans-serif; } .product *{ font-family: 'Rubik', sans-serif; } .cards{padding: 2rem 0 0 0; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-around; } .product{ width: clamp(250px, 25%, 300px); cursor: pointer; } .top{ position: relative; background-color: #F5F5F5; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 16px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .product-logo{ position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; margin: 1rem; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; } .product-logo img{ /* width: 50px; */ height: 20px; } .product-logo:hover{ opacity: 0.7; scale: 1.05; } .product-img img{ width: 80%; margin: 0 10%; } .like-btn{ position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; margin: 1rem; height: 20px; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; } .like-btn path{ height: 20px; } .like-btn:hover{ opacity: 0.7; scale: 1.05; } .bottom{ padding: 1rem; } .name h4{ font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 500; margin: 0; } .name h3{ font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 800; margin: .5rem 0; } .pick-color{ display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; margin: .5rem 0; } .active-color{ opacity: 1; } .circle{ height: 12px; width: 12px; border-radius: 50%; margin: 0 5px 0 0; cursor: pointer; opacity: 0.8; transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; } .circle:hover{ opacity: 1; scale: 1.1; } .white{ background-color: white; border: 1px solid #000; } .red{ background-color: red; } .blue{ background-color: blue; } .black{ background-color: black; } .action{ display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin: 1rem 0; } .add-cart{ background-color: #6506d3; color: white; padding: .5rem 1rem; border: none; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; flex-grow: 1; border: 2px solid #6506d3; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; } .add-cart:hover{ background-color: #4b03a0; border-color: #4b03a0; } .icon{ height: 1rem; margin: 0 0.5rem 0 0; } .icon svg{ height: 1rem; width: 1rem; fill: white; } .price{ font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 500; margin: 0; } .select-size{ background-color: #fff; border: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.30); color: black; padding: .5rem 1rem; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; flex-grow: 4; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 500; margin: 0 0.5rem 0 0; transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; } .select-size:hover{ background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.30); }
